description: A mosquito-borne viral infection causing fever, rash, and body pain.
treatment: Rest, fluids, medications to reduce fever.
prevention: Avoid mosquito bites; use nets and repellents.

description: Parasitic infection causing fever, chills, sweating.
treatment: Antimalarial drugs prescribed by a doctor.
prevention: Use mosquito nets, repellents, and preventive medicine.

description: Neurological condition causing headache and nausea.
prevention: Avoid triggers like stress and certain foods.

description: Bacterial infection causing fever, headache, abdominal pain.
Viral infection causing fever, cough, body aches.
treatment: Rest, hydration, antiviral medication if prescribed.

description: Infection or toxins causing nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain.
Severe heat-related illness causing headache, fatigue, dizziness.
treatment: Move to cool area, fluids, medical care if severe.
